content.title: REST API
content.content:
REST API is an unavoidable feature of any modern web service, and Sapphire makes no exception.

This API is provided by the `rest` module and allows you to administer the CMS and manage its content through exposed REST endpoints.

The `rest` module is mandatory if you want to manage your CMS and its content using our web client 
**Manager UI** (presented in its own chapter of this documentation).

## Install

Add the REST API by installing its package:

 ```shell
 sapphire-cms package install rest
 ```

 or

 ```shell
 scms pkg i rest
 ```

## Usage

The `rest` module provides the `admin` and `management` layers, 
which can be enabled by listing them in the configuration file `sapphire-cms.config.yaml`:

```yaml
# ./sapphire-cms.config.yaml

# ...
layers:
  admin: "@rest"
  management: "@rest"
```
